resources.string: The Final Year Project Selection System designed for the student of Information Engineering College, to browse and choose their desired projects. Selecting the desired one from several projects. Through this system, final year students can select their project titles based on certain criteria and preferences. Project Selection System on Android Mobile is an application used for making a selection process in an easy way. In this application students can view the projects and choose their desired projects and also the supervisor can upload their projects from anywhere using their own mobiles. The main purpose of this application is to make a project selection process by using smart phones. In manual method the process has several problems. It can be summed up in the following: Time consuming , Effort consuming and Errors in manual method.
